6.7.5 Optional methods for compound document servers

OLE-part-release-menu

G.f. method

Summary

When an in-place activation is ended, this method is called on each of the menus that were inserted by OLE-part-insert-menus.

Signature

OLE-part-release-menu obj hmenu => ()

Arguments

obj
An instance of your subclass of <ole-server-framework> or <ole-in-process-server>.

hmenu
An instance of <HMENU>.

Values

None.

Library

OLE-Server

Module

OLE-Server

Description

When an in-place activation is ended, this method is called on each of the menus that were inserted by OLE-part-insert-menus.

This provides an opportunity for you to call DestroyMenu if appropriate. The default method does nothing.

OLE, COM, ActiveX and DBMS Reference - 31 MAR 2000
